And today I'm going to discuss what I call the method to my madness.
Hello and welcome.
I'm Jeffrey Mishlove as well.
I'm his alter ego, you might say.
Originally, when I first launched the New Thinking Allowed channel in 2015, now we're
going into our ninth year, I indicated that my purpose was to help establish a database
of sorts having to do with parapsychology the way I envision it.
I gotta be clear about this, you see, I envision

people.
Traditionally, parapsychology was defined in the United States by J. B. Rhine at Duke
University doing card-guessing experiments.
The Rhine Research Center is still active in
Durham, North Carolina and there are people
today who consider themselves followers and
students of the Rhinean School in Parapsychology.
But I'm not one of those people.
I came of age as a parapsychologist in California
not following any particular school of thought
but building my own individual interdisciplinary
doctoral major in which I viewed parapsychology
not simply as a subdivision of experimental
psychology, which is largely the Rhinean approach,
but as a unique discipline all of its own
with a history going back thousands of years
and encompassing human efforts from many
different directions, whether it's religious
or esoteric thought or alchemy, to explore these latent human potentials that we know
of as psi or psychic functioning.
What I said at that time, and you can listen to
it today if you take a look at the introductory
video that I made nine years ago and it's
still up on our channel, is that the day will
come when college-level degree programs in
parapsychology will be available and not just
the Rhinean type of card-guessing experiments.
To be fair to them, experimental psychology isn't the only approach to the paranormal.
Any viewer of this channel for a long time
will realize that we cover essentially three
areas, but even more than three, the three
basic areas are consciousness, the paranormal,
and spirituality.
To that, of course, we add a sprinkling of
other topics ranging from healing to the history
and sociology of various interesting things.
Ultimately, my message has been consistently,
starting with the very first In Presence monologue
that I created back in 2018, become the best version of yourself.
Be the best person you can, the best father, the
best mother, the best son, daughter, brother,
sister, friend, student, teacher, whatever you are, the best version of you.
If you do that, the universe will reach out to help you in uncanny ways because, as I
see it, the universe is conscious.
Now, we're entering into a new era in the
New Thinking Allowed channel and I'm excited
to share with you some of these new developments.
First is the existence, just a few days old, but it's here now.
It is up and running, the New Thinking Allowed chatbot.
It has been trained on over 1,600 of our video transcripts.
The chatbot, you could say it's your own
personal version of me because you can query it.
You can ask any question related to the content
of our vast archives and it will give you
a relevant, accurate, and intelligent answer.
I have to point out, of course, that we're still training the chatbot.
It's not perfect.
It may never be perfect.
I know one of our guests tried to query the

And strangely, if he were to ask questions

So we're still receiving feedback about the chatbot.
You can access the New Thinking Allowed chatbot for free.
What you have to do is go to AI.ServiceSpace.Org

When you do that, you can access all of the Service Space chatbots and you'll see the

So I invite you to check out our chatbot.
That would save you a lot of time because I think most of our viewers don't have the

over a thousand, well over a thousand videos.
Now, occasionally I hear from viewers who ask, why are you putting up so many videos
every week?
What do you expect from me?
I don't have the time or the energy to pay attention to all those videos.
Stop doing it!
And to those of you who feel that way, my response is very simple.
If you don't have the time and the energy, don't watch.
Nobody's forcing you to.
And we're not about to stop doing it because
some of you feel overwhelmed by the amount
of content that we're producing.
Now, I do remember a viewer some years ago was pointing to a book called RenÃ© GuÃ©non

And I'll admit, when you're a volunteer organization
putting up four to five videos every week,
there can be quality issues from time to time, it's true.
So it does raise the question, why are we doing it?
I think those of you who are steadfast listeners
and viewers of this material deserve an answer.
And the answer is this.
I've benefited all of my adult life by being
immersed in this material so that it's a culture
of which I feel deeply embedded.
I have to say this, I consider myself practically the happiest person I know.
And there are many good reasons.
The number one reason, of course, is that
45 years ago I married a wonderful woman and
have stayed married all of that time.
And that's probably the single biggest reason I'm as happy as I am.
However, the second most important reason is that I've devoted my life to be a life
of service in the name of educating people about the realities of the paranormal.
And there's so much to be said, the
paranormal touches every aspect of our life.
It's not just exotic things like UFO encounters and metal bending, for example.
I think that any human being who doesn't
understand something about their own spiritual
nature and what we can learn about our deep self from paying attention to consciousness
research, parapsychology, and spirituality is missing out, missing out on the greatest
treasure that any human being can possess.
And that treasure is self-awareness.
That's what this is all about.
We live in a culture, I have to say, a materialistic
world which is doing a lot to deprive each
and every one of you out there of self-awareness.
You may not agree with me about this, and of course you're entitled to your opinion,
but the truth of the matter as I see it is most of us become, in effect, slaves.
Slaves to our jobs, slaves to our possessions, slaves to our families.
It's not always bad.
I encourage people, as I mentioned earlier, to be the best â€“ brother, sister, mother,
aunt, uncle, son or daughter â€“ that you can be.
But above all, it means knowing yourself,
being aware of yourself, not as a cog in the
great machine of society, not as just a biological
machine as one of my guests, Marvin Minsky,
said, you should be proud of being a machine made out of meat.
No, you're much more than that.
You are so much more than that.
We live in a culture that wants you to think
you're not, that wants you to be a good worker bee,
that wants you to be a cog in the great machine of society,
that doesn't care how much self-awareness you
have, because self-awareness, by its very nature,
is, from the point of view of mainstream society, is revolutionary.
It's insidious. It's undermining the basic stability of society.
What would we do if everybody were self-aware?
But, from my point of view, we need more and more
people to be self-aware because humanity is facing
the biggest challenges it ever has in our history,
perhaps going back 300,000 years, 30,000 years,
300 million years, depending on your perspective.
But here's what we're facing â€“ the possible
destruction of the human race in our own lifetime
because we have the technology to pull that off,
and it would only take a few madmen to do it.
When I talk about madmen, it's important to
realize that mental health is a very serious
issue on this planet. A significant percentage
of people that you and I know that we speak to,
probably almost on a daily basis, are suffering
from various forms of neurosis and psychosis and
character disorders and depression and addiction.
And the list goes on. Many people think, for
example, that the various addictions that we face â€“
drug addiction isn't the only kind either â€“
there's food addiction, there's sex addiction,
there are addictions to shopping and gambling.
But the point I want to make is that many people
think â€“ and I'm in that camp, I agree with
this position â€“ that all of these addictions
are efforts to satisfy a much deeper need that we
all have. The deeper need has been described in
spiritual traditions and mystical traditions
as the desire for union with the divine.
That's a difficult path. That is a path that very
few people take. That is the path of mysticism.
And it is a cherished path. It is part of the primeval tradition of humanity. It is
part of our perennial philosophy. But it is a path for a select few people. Most of us
lack the resources to devote our lives to
mysticism, to devote our lives to union with
the divine. But because we're not able, because
of this lifestyle we find ourselves in, we're not
able to go live in a monastery or an ashram
and pursue a full-time career as a meditator.
So we often substitute for that desire for union. We think of food or drugs or
any of the other addictions. That's the general
theory that addictions are substitutes for spiritual
realization. But what if we could have a measure
of spiritual realization every day or at least
four or five times a week? You see, that's what
this channel is about. I would just love for
viewers to be able to experience the incredible joy, the sweet nectar of bliss
that I have been privileged to experience
because of my blessed life as an explorer of
these areas. It has been so wonderful. I just
am filled with a great desire to share this as
much as I can. For the last nine years my philosophy has been to give as much away
for free as possible, which is one reason that
for the time being at least you can access
our New Thinking Allowed Chatbot for free. We're
not charging you. I have to credit the people who

in allowing me to create it. I actually think,
because I know that some viewers would like
to have more of a one-on-one exchange with me,
that for many people, because we're up over 155,000 subscribers right now, that chatbot
is a substitute. It's a way that you could
interact with, not me really, it's a chatbot,
but with the content of over a thousand interviews
that have been on this channel. You don't have to
watch them all if you have questions. I am
grateful that I know there's a hardcore number
of viewers on this channel who do make a point
of watching as many of the videos as they can.
I hear from those people who tell me that they're
so grateful for what we do. It has helped their
lives in so many different ways. Now, the next
thing I want to share with you is a project that's
still in development, but I think it's important
that you know that I consider education central
to our mission. When I set up this channel in
2015, I was very explicit about it, that someday
there are going to be educational programs that
view parapsychology in the broad way that I do.
When that happens, these videos, this archive will
be a repository of knowledge that can be drawn

the administrators of two very open colleges in
California, both accredited by the Western
Association of Schools and Colleges. I said,
how about if we create a few courses based on the

that each of these administrators, both of whom

Furthermore, why stop at just offering a few

degree program in parapsychology, just as you've

graduate degree program, maybe a master's or

If all goes well, we will be offering advanced

not exclusively because we'll find live instructors
as well, but the content of the New Thinking
Allowed archives will form the backbone of advanced
educational programs. I realize, of course,

Some of you are already professionals and might want continuing education credit,
and we're looking at that. We want to see if we
can't offer continuing education units for people
who view our videos because we're moving into a
new era in which it's going to be incumbent upon
each and every person to become the best version
of themselves, to become the wisest and most
knowledgeable version of themselves. Particularly,
when I say knowledgeable, I mean with regard to

has to do with the gradual disclosure that is

species is encountering an intelligent species

not only of material science and technology,
but also of spiritual matters.
If we are going to enter into what I would call
the galactic civilization of space-faring cultures,

exactly that, we have to show that we ourselves

and a good heart, compassion that would make us

is changing and changing rapidly. I mean,
the quickness with which we have just put up

So, the requirement for the human population,
